attributes.action: reinstate Professor Nutt, issue him with a full apology, and sort out his Government's relationship with science advisors in general.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Government has shown a lamentable and deplorable attitude to science-based advice, the latest example of which is the sacking of Professor Nutt for attempting to open up an honest debate on drug use.

This must stop.  A good first step would be to reinstate Professor Nutt to his job and issue him with a full apology, as a sign that they will in future start listening to their science advisors.
